docs.title: Intra-EPG Isolation
docs.text:
ACI demo Youtube Video:

ACI InterOp White Paper

docs.title: Virtual connect cli
docs.text:
Synergy Virtual Connect offers read-only CLI access. You need to use default "netop" operator account.

For official HPE document on this feature, please refer to the doc at Enable netop user using OneView GUI.

docs.title: SSH Access
docs.text:
Step 1. Note down Synergy virtual connect mgmt IP address

Step 2. Configure "netop" user password

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Step 3. SSH into VC mgmt IP address using netop account.

$ ssh <virtual connect module mgmt IP address>
This interconnect module is a company owned asset and provided for the exclusive use of authorized personnel. Unauthorized use or abuse of this system may lead to corrective action including termination, civil and/or criminal penalties.
netop@10.16.41.27's password:
Connected to 127.0.0.1

Entering character mode
Escape character is '^]'.



            Virtual Connect SE 100Gb F32 Module for Synergy
        Type "show system acknowledgement" to see the licenses
        for the open source software used by this product.


OneView>

docs.title: Port-channel
docs.text:
#From VC-module in slot 3
OneView> dump np-la-db
port-channel                 : po2
port-channel interface index : 281
HwTrunkId                    : 0
Number of configured ports   : 4
Number of active ports       : 4
Number of local ports        : 2
Number of remote ports       : 2
Selection Policy             : 3
multicast                    : enabled
multicast index              : 1
IfName                          unit   ModuleId   Distributing
--------------------------------------------------------------
ethernet0/0/6:1                 0      0          Enabled
ethernet0/0/6:2                 0      0          Enabled
ethernet1/0/6:1                 0      1          Enabled
ethernet1/0/6:2                 0      1          Enabled

...
...
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Egress Mask port list   :
